property.value: ■ Dragon Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields. Before each break, shieldify the top card of your deck or put it on top of one of your shields face up.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone and put it on top of one of its owner's shields face up. ■ Whenever one of your creatures would leave, you may put a face up card from a player's shield zone into its owner's graveyard instead.

property.value: ■ Gate of Moonless Night Zetsu: At the end of each turn, you may choose a total of 6 Magic Tools from your graveyard or battle zone and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard on top of them. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature or whenever it attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroy it, then your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. ■ Whenever a card is put into your opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and destroys the other one. Then choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and puts the other one into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose any number of cards in a player's graveyard. It's owner puts the chosen cards on the bottom of their deck in any order. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than the number of chosen cards and destroy it.
